column4: Hi ! any of you are able to play asx file frome Ubuntu ? I have install MPlayer and tried to open an URL: .... http://www.nasa.gov/55644main_NASATV_Windows.asx  and it gives me an error
the error is : Couldn't resolve name for AF_INET6
open the .asx in text editor and use one of the urls from inside with mplayer
